![](https://eastlandtexas.gov/api/blob/viewBlob?i=5jFHQSqlw%252BtPPTV55BcvbJD7%252BFkRwjECmGLHLnsAARSRLXWfphwFZfgck9TyIPTj&s=xlarge)

The purpose of the Youth Sports Advisory Board (hereinafter referred to as “The Board”) is to provide recommendations to the City Manager and/or Eastland Board of City Commissioners regarding Eastland youth sports activity and facilities. Additionally, the Board will have the primary responsibility of coordinating maintenance and scheduling use of the City Youth Sports Complex as well as oversee concession operations.

The Board will consist of 7 members (two at large, two baseball, two softball, one t-ball) appointed by the City Commission.
